title: Since I'm Not At The National "T206" Sale...
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: Since I'm Not At The National "T206" Sale...
posts.post_content:
I have the following graded T206 cards for sale (plus a couple T201's). Mostly SGC with a few PSA cards; vast majority look great for the grade.  All prices include shipping!  Check, money order, or paypal are okay. My email address is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url] . Thanks for looking! Here are the pics:

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157621761406897/detail/[/url]
